T02D2655:308b-1: sarba karma a'a wa ra na bi sho dha ni mandala bi dhi:/
T02D2655:308b-3: las kyis grib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa
T02D2655:308b-4: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / bcom
T02D2655:308b-5: ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2655:308b-6: bden par gsungs la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2655:308b-7: dkyil 'khor cho ga bri bar bya //
T02D2655:308b-8: gang du las ni yod gyur na //
T02D2655:308b-9: las kyi cho ga rnams med pa //
T02D2655:308b-10: de ni spyi yi rgyud dag las //
T02D2655:308b-11: gsungs pa'i cho ga mkhas pas brten //
T02D2655:308b-12: dkyil 'khor sum stong dag dang ni //
T02D2655:308b-13: lnga brgyar gsungs pa gang yin pa'i //
T02D2655:308b-14: spyi yi cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D2655:308b-15: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2655:308b-16: sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson pa //
T02D2655:308b-17: snying rje ldan pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2655:308b-18: grangs sam dus sam mtshan ma'am //
T02D2655:308b-19: bsnyen pa tshul bzhin byas pa yis //
T02D2655:308b-20: sa yi cho ga tshul bzhin bya //
T02D2655:308b-21: lha dang bum pa lhag gnas dang //
T02D2655:308b-22: gson gshin slob ma gang rung bas //
T02D2655:308b-23: bdun po rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D2655:308b-24: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sbyin par bya //
T02D2655:308b-25: so shing srung skud ku sha dang //
T02D2655:308b-26: chos bshad pa ni byas kyang rung //
T02D2655:308b-27: gtad dang drag po'i las dang ni //
T02D2655:308b-28: sbyang dang byin rlabs bya mi dgos //
T02D2655:308b-29: gru bzhi sgo bzhi thig btab la //
T02D2655:308b-30: de yi dbus su padma ni //
T02D2655:308b-31: 'dab ma brgyad pa khru do bri ;
T02D2655:308b-32: / dkyil 'khor lhag ma'i tshad dang ni //
T02D2655:308b-33: ci 'dod pa ni nyid du bri //
T02D2655:308b-34: yo long chung du dag gis kyang //
T02D2655:308b-35: bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2655:308b-36: phyi nas gcig nyid kyis kyang ni //
T02D2655:308b-37: tshig rkyang du ni bri bar bya //
T02D2655:308b-38: dkyil 'khor kun du zlum por bya //
T02D2655:308b-39: de nas phyogs mtshams spyod pa dang //
T02D2655:308b-40: 'dod pa'i lha rnams bri bar bya //
T02D2655:308b-41: so so'i sngags kyi rim pa bzhin //
T02D2655:308b-42: de nas spyan yang drang bar bya //
T02D2655:308b-43: bdag po rnams kyi snying po yis //
T02D2655:308b-44: de yi 'og tu mchod par bya //
T02D2655:308b-45: bum pa gang pa de steng du //
T02D2655:308b-46: cho ga bzhin du rdzas gzhag go //
T02D2655:308b-47: las kun byed pa'i dkyil 'khor de //
T02D2655:308b-48: bsang ba gsang ba'i bdag po gsung //
T02D2655:308b-50: dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang //
T02D2655:308b-51: sgrub pa po ni dbang bskur ba //
T02D2655:308b-53: mchod pa la sogs thams cad kyang //
T02D2655:308b-54: rgyud las bshad pa bzhin du bya //
T02D2655:308b-55: zhes bshad pas 'dir khyad par ni /
T02D2655:309a-2: rdo rje chen po bri bar bya //
T02D2655:309a-3: 'dab ma brgyad la bkra shis brgyad //
T02D2655:309a-4: shar du dpal be'u 'khor lo ste //
T02D2655:309a-5: lho ru padma rgyal mtshan gnyis //
T02D2655:309a-6: nub tu gdugs dang bum pa ste //
T02D2655:309a-7: byang du dung dang nya bri'o //
T02D2655:309a-8: phur ba ra ba dra ba gzhag / srung ba rtsa ba'i sngags sam ni ;
T02D2655:309a-9: / yang na de yi snying pos bya //
T02D2655:309a-10: bla re ba dan sku gzungs sogs //
T02D2655:309a-11: mchod dang gtor ma la sogs dgram //
T02D2655:309a-12: 'bru sman rin chen lnga ldan pa'i //
T02D2655:309a-13: bum pa de yi dbus su gzhag / khrus dang chos gos ldan pa yi //
T02D2655:309a-14: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas //
T02D2655:309a-15: bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung //
T02D2655:309a-16: sham gis thams cad stong pa las //
T02D2655:309a-17: bam mam bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02D2655:309a-18: de nang padma zla dbus su //
T02D2655:309a-19: bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs bskyed pa las //
T02D2655:309a-20: pad 'dab brgyad la lha mo brgyad //
T02D2655:309a-22: mdangs ldan ma dang dri med ma //
T02D2655:309a-23: dkar dang dmar dang sngo dang ljang //
T02D2655:309a-24: dpal be'u padma gdugs dang dung //
T02D2655:309a-25: dbang po gshin rje chu bdag dang //
T02D2655:309a-26: gnod sbyin phyogs su bsgom par bya //
T02D2655:309a-28: dkar sham ma dang yid gzhungs ma //
T02D2655:309a-29: dkar sngo dmar skya ljang ba'i mdog /'khor lo rgyal mtshan bum pa nya //
T02D2655:309a-30: me dang srin po rlung lta dang //
T02D2655:309a-31: dbang ldan ngos su rnam par bsam //
T02D2655:309a-32: kun kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
T02D2655:309a-33: zla ba'i rgyab brten rin chen brgyan //
T02D2655:309a-34: g-yon pa thams cad dku la gtad //
T02D2655:309a-35: bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyi sngags //
T02D2655:309a-36: aom mam ga la shr'i yam dza da ma dza sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-37: aom mam ga la padma sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-38: aom mam ga la tsha tram sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-39: aom mam ga la sham kha sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-40: aom mam ga la tsakra sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-41: aom mam ga la dhva dza sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-42: aom mam ga la ka la sha sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-43: aom mam ga la manghya [*mat+sya?] sv'a h'a /
T02D2655:309a-44: spyan drang bstim dang mchod bstod bya //
T02D2655:309a-45: de yi snying ga'i zla ba la //
T02D2655:309a-46: gsang sngags dmigs te ci nus bzlas //
T02D2655:309a-47: mchod dang bstod dang gtor ma gtang //
T02D2655:309a-48: khrus byas brtsam pa'i slob ma rnams /
T02D2655:309a-49: dkyil 'khor de yi mdun nyid du //
T02D2655:309a-50: bdun po rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D2655:309a-51: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed de la sbyin //
T02D2655:309a-52: gshin la brdeg dang brab pa dang //
T02D2655:309a-53: 'byor pa yong na sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2655:309a-54: de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur sbyin //
T02D2655:309a-55: 'di ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chu //
T02D2655:309b-0: ser sna'i dri ma sbyong mdzad @309b cing ;
T02D2655:309b-1: / sbyin pa dri yi legs bsgos pas //
T02D2655:309b-2: khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2655:309b-3: de ltar pha rol phyin drug la //
T02D2655:309b-4: gson po bkra shis rdzas brgyad bri //
T02D2655:309b-5: raksha zhes pas bsrung bar bya //
T02D2655:309b-6: aa pa na yas byar par bya //
T02D2655:309b-7: mchod rten rab gnas tsha tsha gdab //
T02D2655:309b-8: ngan pa bzlog la las 'di bya //
T02D2655:309b-9: 'di ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02D2655:309b-10: spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur ba'i 'os //
T02D2655:309b-11: chos bka' rgya chen zab mo 'di //
T02D2655:309b-12: rgyal po bzhin du mnyes par dka' //
T02D2655:309b-13: mnyes par gyur na de bzhin du //
T02D2655:309b-14: yon tan mchog gi nor sbyin byed //
T02D2655:309b-15: 'di bris pa yi dge ba yis //
T02D2655:309b-16: ngan song rnam sbyang thar lam sgrub //
T02D2655:309b-17: kun gyis bzang po mthong bar shog / slob dpon
T02D2655:309b-18: mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
